Reviews.Title: worst ever
Reviews.Author: M Smith "msmith8182"
Reviews.Content: Dont bother buying this no matter how good of a price is advertised.  Total waste of money.  All my pictures taken from a distance come out blurry, it wont focus, the zoom only makes it worse, its slow. AWFUL!!

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: John Ell "TechBurst"
Reviews.Content: The response time from picture to the next picture was much slower than my old camera.  Ended up replacing it altogether after I purchased it.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.1 megapixels, ideal for prints up to 13 x 19 (Up to 3648 x 2736 dpi)
3x optical / 8x digital zoom
2.7 color LCD screen
SD/SDHC Memory Card
USB 2.0 Connectivity
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar ViviCam X327 - Digital camera - compact - 10.1 Mpix - optical zoom: 3 x - supported memory: MMC, SD, SDHC
